    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void addDvdToLibrary()
      The user is prompted to add a Dvd to the DVD Library.
      private void displayDvdInfoId()
      The user is prompted to find the info for a DVD in the library using the DVD ID, it will print the DVD info on the console if it is in Library Then after it is shown, they are asked again whether they want to show another
      private void displayDvdLibrary()
      Returns a list of the DVDs in the library and their IDs to the console
      private void displayDvdTitle()
      The user is prompted to Search for a DVD in the library using the DVD Title, it will print the DVD info on the console if it is in Library
      private void editDvdInLibrary()
      The user is prompted to choose a DVD in the Library to edit, using DVD ID.
      private void endProgram()
      Writes the DVD Library info into the txt file, then closes the file
      private void exitMessage()
      Exit message
      private int getMainMenu()
      Prints the Main menu's options on console, then returns an int of the user's choice
      private void removeDvdFromLibrary()
      The user is prompted to remove a Dvd from the DVD Library using the dvd ID.
      void runApp()
      Method to run the App, it starts the main menu
      private void startProgram()
      Opens the txt file when the program starts, transfers file data into memory
      private void unknownCommand()
      unknown command message

        Writes the DVD Library info into the txt file, then closes the file

        private int getMainMenu()
        Prints the Main menu's options on console, then returns an int of the user's choice
        Returns:
        - an int of the user's choice

      • addDvdToLibrary

        private void addDvdToLibrary()
        The user is prompted to add a Dvd to the DVD Library. Then after it is added, they are asked again whether they want to add another

      • displayDvdLibrary

        private void displayDvdLibrary()
        Returns a list of the DVDs in the library and their IDs to the console

      • displayDvdInfoId

        private void displayDvdInfoId()
        The user is prompted to find the info for a DVD in the library using the DVD ID, it will print the DVD info on the console if it is in Library Then after it is shown, they are asked again whether they want to show another

      • displayDvdTitle

        private void displayDvdTitle()
        The user is prompted to Search for a DVD in the library using the DVD Title, it will print the DVD info on the console if it is in Library

      • removeDvdFromLibrary

        private void removeDvdFromLibrary()
        The user is prompted to remove a Dvd from the DVD Library using the dvd ID. Then after it is removed, they are asked again whether they want to remove another

      • editDvdInLibrary

        private void editDvdInLibrary()
        The user is prompted to choose a DVD in the Library to edit, using DVD ID. Then the user chooses the information they want to edit and edits it. Then they are asked whether they want to edit more information on the same DVD or another one.

      • unknownCommand

        private void unknownCommand()
        unknown command message

      • exitMessage

        private void exitMessage()
        Exit message
